summary: This mod improve some basic perks(for example Novice,Apprentice,adept,expert and Master Destruction) for their magick performance depend on skills that actors have.
descriptionHtml:
This Mod improved Alteration,Conjuration,Destruction,Illusion and Restoration perks.
Details
Cast <RANK> level <Magick> spells for half magicka. <Perk RANK> level <Magick> spells will gradually improve as your <Magick> skill grows.
for example
Cast Novice level Conjuration spells for half magicka. Novice level Conjuration spells will gradually improve as your Conjuration skill grows.
That Rate is +1%/1 skill.
There is no limit so it can be adapted over 100+ skill(if you used uncapper).

This mod affect not only PC who hase each Perks but also NPC(included followers).

This mod changed a little from vanilla.
So there is alomost never conflict between this mod and others.
I think.

Have a good travels.
author: KotenkoTenko
